title: Power with Combinatorics
text:
Your task is to find aexpb,a: Provided in input, 0 ≤ a ≤ 105b: Provided in Input, 0 ≤ b ≤ 105exp = (nC0)2+ (nC1)2+ (nC2)2+ ... + (nCn)2,n: Provided in the input, 0 ≤ n ≤ 105As the answer can be too large, you need to output modulo 109+7.nCr denotes n choose r.InputThe first line of each input file contains number of test cases t (t ≤ 1000).Then follow a new line.Then follow t lines, each containing 3 integers, (i.e. a b n in order) each of them separated by a space.OutputOutput Contains t lines, ith line contains the answer of the ith test case .ExampleInput:1
1 1 1Output:1ExplanationIn First test case, the Value of exp is 2, value of 121is 1, so output is 1.Click here to see my set of problems at Spoj.
